title: 15 Weird Facts You Don't Know About Wolves
description: “My daughter is always fascinated with wolves and she loves reading this book. Two thumbs up for writing these facts!” – Lian Allen“Wolves are awesome and so is this book!” – Trey BowmanEducational facts and videos make this series a best buy. You will get a great insight on the animals that you might have thought you knew a lot about.We have created a layout that not only educates, but also entertains the readers. This makes learning fun and is a great way to encourage further reading.The "Weird Facts" series creates an environment for children to independently read and learn.
author: Grant Lee
